3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have clear height and thickness. Floors are distinct planes. Interior volume is well-perceived. Wall corners are properly defined. Viewing angle is isometric. Interior is visible from an elevated perspective with minimal distortion. Roof/ceiling is cleanly removed, and interior spaces are fully visible without broken geometry.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Number of rooms and adjacency relationships are correct. Major wall positions and wall lengths are highly accurate. Internal partitions are correctly placed. Doors are present and on the correct walls. Windows are present and on the correct walls. Openings are proportionally sized.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture (beds, sofas, tables), kitchen elements, and bathroom fixtures are all present. Furniture is placed in correct rooms with reasonable scale and logical orientation.

visual_clarity.notes: Walls, floors, and openings are clearly distinguishable and the geometry is readable. Interior is well-lit and clearly visible without obscuring geometry. Consistent material usage, no major rendering artifacts, and a clean background.

summary: The 2D floor plan has been converted to an excellent quality 3D isometric cutaway render, demonstrating high geometric fidelity and clear rendering.
